metadataAttributes.Title: Trees and Graphs: Basics
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Basic algorithms on tree data structures, binary search trees, self-balancing trees, graph data structures and basic traversal algorithms on graphs. This course also covers advanced topics such as kd-trees for spatial data and algorithms for spatial data.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Analysis of Algorithms,Algorithm Design,Python Programming,Data Structure Design,Graphs Algorithms,
